resources.string: Alien is a 1979 British-American science-fiction horror film directed by Ridley Scott, and starring Sigourney Weaver, Tom Skerritt, Veronica Cartwright, Harry Dean Stanton, John Hurt, Ian Holm and Yaphet Kotto. The film\'s title refers to a highly aggressive extraterrestrial creature that stalks and attacks the crew of a spaceship. Dan O\'Bannon wrote the screenplay from a story he wrote with Ronald Shusett, drawing influence from previous works of science fiction and horror.
